duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute a variety of land surveying projects with a focus on precision and accuracy.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and other surveying software to produce high-quality drawings and maps.
Conduct boundary surveys, ALTA surveys, leveling, traversing, GPS data collection, and legal description interpretation.
Provide expertise and input during project planning, proposal, and project scope establishment.
Work with project managers to ensure projects are on track in terms of scope, budget, and schedule.
Manage survey crew operations, ensuring field calculations and data collection are accurate and error-free.
Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders to maintain a collaborative project environment.
Attend industry events, training, and networking opportunities to stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in surveying.

education_certification.credential: LSIT or PLS certification is highly desirable.
Bachelor's degree in Surveying, Geomatics, Civil Engineering, or related field.
